entry.title: [softfork proposal] Strict DER signatures
entry.summary: Pieter Wuille responded to someone's comment and thanked them for their input. The commenter, Douglas Roark, replied with approval of the revisions made by Pieter. The communication took place via email using PGP encryption, which is a form of secure messaging that uses public and private keys to encrypt and decrypt messages. The email signature includes Douglas Roark's PGP key ID.
